text: I was in a tight spot wish a property I had inherited from a deceased family member and these guys offered me a fair cash deal along with being extremely professional and helpful. Would recommend MXP any day.

First of all I want to say that Max is a smart and extreme professional. He happens to be very knowledgeable about the Real Estate Business. We love doing business with him and will continue to. Honest, hard working, Professional and very Passionate about what he does.
Beware this outfit that presents themselves as cash buyers....will tie up your property...waste your time...take you to the moment of closing and then walk....
Easy to work with, professional and extremely knowledgeable about the Phoenix market!
